name: European Potato Trade Association
membership:
Cooperation with Food European and International organisations
Member of CELCAA (www.celcaa.eu)
goal:
Improve the commercial and international activities of the potato trade;
Protect the professional interests and the commercial function on a European and International level;
and represent the profession in and at all official and international organisations.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Business and Industry, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Enlargement, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives:
Plant health policy
Market regime for potatoes
Trade Policy
Promotion of Agricultural products
Food safety
Sustainability
Research and development
